TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration extends System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定义安全象征服务的配置 (STS)。

span.span: Defines the configuration for a security token service (STS).

summary.span: 实现 STSs 从 类派生的类。

span.span: Classes that implement STSs derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，你可以参阅`Federation Metadata`示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例和信息提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的自定义实现类以支持被动 STS 处理 SWT 令牌。The following code shows a custom implementation of the class to support a passive STS that processes SWT tokens. 配置已初始化，并且存储在 HTTP 应用程序状态第一次静态`Current`访问属性。The configuration is initialized and stored in the HTTP application state the first time the static `Current` property is accessed. 构造函数初始化与自定义 STS、 自定义颁发者令牌解析程序，以及默认令牌类型 (的 SWT 令牌类型 URI) 的类型的自定义配置的属性。The constructor initializes the properties of the custom configuration with the type of the custom STS, a custom issuer token resolver, and the default token type (the URI of the SWT token type). 它还添加到默认处理程序集合的 SWT 令牌处理程序。It also adds an SWT token handler to the default handler collection. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenserviceconfiguration.cs#2)] 下面的代码演示如何调用自定义的被动 STS 处理 WS 联合身份验证请求，通过调用方法中的代码后面`default.aspx.cs`文件。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. 方法初始化的实例`PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService`类使用的属性集`CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration`中前面的示例所示的类。The method initializes an instance of the `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` class using the properties set on the `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` class shown in the previous example. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

summary.span: 从 属性中指定的 创建安全标记服务 (STS) 实例。

span.span: Creates an security token service (STS) instance from the specified in the property.

returns.span: 属性中指定的 实例。

span.span: An instance of the specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的类属性必须实现的构造函数的类型的参数。The class specified in the property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type . ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，你可以参阅`Federation Metadata`示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例和信息提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的自定义实现类以支持被动 STS 处理 SWT 令牌。The following code shows a custom implementation of the class to support a passive STS that processes SWT tokens. 配置已初始化，并且存储在 HTTP 应用程序状态第一次静态`Current`访问属性。The configuration is initialized and stored in the HTTP application state the first time the static `Current` property is accessed. 构造函数初始化与自定义 STS、 自定义颁发者令牌解析程序，以及默认令牌类型 (的 SWT 令牌类型 URI) 的类型的自定义配置的属性。The constructor initializes the properties of the custom configuration with the type of the custom STS, a custom issuer token resolver, and the default token type (the URI of the SWT token type). 它还添加到默认处理程序集合的 SWT 令牌处理程序。It also adds an SWT token handler to the default handler collection. 下面的代码演示如何调用自定义的被动 STS 处理 WS 联合身份验证请求，通过调用方法中的代码后面`default.aspx.cs`文件。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. 方法初始化的实例`PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService`类使用当前设置的属性`CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration`对象。The method initializes an instance of the `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` class using the properties set on the current `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` object. `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.Current`通过实现属性`CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration`类，并返回在 HTTP 应用程序状态保存类的实例。The `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.Current` property is implemented by the `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` class and returns the instance of the class that is saved in the HTTP application state. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultMaxSymmetricKeySizeInBits { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置如果选中，则请求中指定的 KeySize 是否位于此限制内的默认密钥大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the default key size limit in bits used check if the KeySize specified in the request is within this limit.

value.span: 默认密钥大小限制（以位为单位）。

span.span: The default key size limit, in bits.
The default is 1024.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这仅适用于的对称密钥的大小写。This only applies to the symmetric key case.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultSymmetricKeySizeInBits { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发的令牌中使用的默认密钥大小（位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the default key size in bits used in the issued token.

value.span: 在颁发的令牌中使用的密钥大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The key size used in the issued token, in bits.
The default is 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这仅适用于的对称密钥的大小写。This only applies to the symmetric key case.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan DefaultTokenLifetime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发的令牌中使用的默认生命周期。

span.span: Gets or sets the default lifetime used in the issued tokens.

value.span: 要在已颁发令牌中使用的默认生存期。

span.span: The default lifetime to use in issued tokens.
The default is 1 day.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultTokenType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置令牌颁发中使用的默认令牌类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the default token type that is used in token issuance.

value.span: 返回包含默认令牌类型字符串。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the default token type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 格式; 指定的字符串值例如，对于 SAML 1.1 令牌类型，以下是字符串值： http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1。The string values are specified in URI format; for example, for the SAML 1.1 token type, the following is the string value: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1. 默认值设置为 SAML 1.1 令牌类型。The default token type is set to SAML 1.1.

span.span: The specified value is or empty.

exception.span: 指定值未在标记处理程序中定义。

span.span: The specified value is not defined in the token handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableWsdl { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否应为安全标记服务 (STS)启用启用 WSDL 生成。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether WSDL generation should be enabled for the security token service (STS).

value.span: 若要 STS 启用 WSDL 生成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to enable WSDL generation for the STS; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MaximumTokenLifetime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置已颁发标识的最大标识生存期。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.

value.span: 用于颁布令牌的最长令牌生命期。

span.span: The maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
The default is 1 day.

The type of the security token service.

value.span: 此类型必须派生自 类。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的类属性必须实现的构造函数的类型的参数。The class specified in the property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ SigningCredentials { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置签名凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the signing credentials.
The signing credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 实现有效的安全令牌服务 (STS) 时，将忽略 属性。The property is ignored when implementing an active security token service (STS). 相反，您必须通过承载您的 STS 的服务主机上的 属性设置服务证书。Instead you must set the service certificate through the property on the service host that is hosting your STS. 用于有效的 STS 的服务主机由 类表示。The service host used for an active STS is represented by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TokenIssuerName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发者名称，以便在已颁发令牌中设置它。

span.span: Gets or sets the issuer name so that it can be set in the issued token.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为 或者空字符串。

span.span: An attempt to set the property to or an empty string occurs.
